predicate.note: Frames file for 'relay' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

example.name: all args
example.text: Col. North conveyed the request to his superiors and to Assistant Secretary of State Elliot Abrams, who [*T*-1] relayed it to Secretary of State George Shultz.

example.name: no destination
example.text: Luis Carlos, knowing that helping the Americans could advance the career of any Panamanian officer, relayed Tony's reports on the leftist tendencies he observed among his fellow students and, more important, among his officers and instructors.
example.arg: knowing that helping the Americans could advance the career of any Panamanian officer
Tony's reports on the leftist tendencies he observed among his fellow students and, more important, among his officers and instructors
